Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.controller

Class WorkedHoursController

java.lang.Object
com.example.group1hrmsapp.controller.WorkedHoursController
@Controller
public class WorkedHoursController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller responsible for managing worked hours operations.

    • findPaginated

      @GetMapping("/workedHoursPage") public java.lang.String findPaginated​(@RequestParam(name="pageNo",defaultValue="1") int pageNo, @RequestParam(name="size",defaultValue="10") int pageSize, @RequestParam(name="sortField",defaultValue="requestDate") java.lang.String sortField, @RequestParam(name="sortDir",defaultValue="asc") java.lang.String sortDir, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      View paginated records of worked hours.
      Parameters:
      pageNo - current page number.
      pageSize - number of records per page.
      sortField - the field to sort by.
      sortDir - the direction of sort (asc/desc).
      model - the Spring UI model.
      Returns:
      the view name for the paginated worked hours list.

    • filterWorkedHours

      @PostMapping("/filterWorkedHours") public java.lang.String filterWorkedHours​(@RequestParam(name="employeeId",required=false) java.lang.Long employeeId, @RequestParam(name="startDate",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd") java.time.LocalDate startDateStr, @RequestParam(name="endDate",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd") java.time.LocalDate endDateStr, @RequestParam(name="workedHoursStatus",required=false) java.lang.String workedHoursStatus, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Filter the worked hours based on provided criteria.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - the ID of the employee.
      startDateStr - the start date of the filter.
      endDateStr - the end date of the filter.
      workedHoursStatus - the status of the worked hours.
      model - the Spring UI model.
      Returns:
      the view name after filtering worked hours.
